text: My child has been attending to Mindspace RTC and we have a fantastic experience with the team. .The staffs are incredibly friendly and attentive, creating a safe and welcoming environment for the children. They offer a variety of engaging activities, from arts and crafts to outdoor play, ensuring that kids are always entertained and learning something new. The center also provides healthy snacks and helps with homework, which is a huge plus for busy parents . Overall, it's a great place where children can have fun and stay safe after school. Highly recommended! üëç

The teachers are responsible, reliable and most of all, my boy likes them, showing they make an effort to connect with and engage him. The teachers are also very approachable and will patiently answer any questions we parents have. They are also receptive to constructive feedback. We appreciate the team in this Center and are happy to recommend this Center to any parents who are looking for an effective afterschool care.

Mindspace at RTC has provided a very conducive environment for my child to learn and play after school hours. They even help by fetching my child from school after enrichment classes and keeping them engaged with many different activities during holidays and HBL (home-based learning) days. The teachers and staff at RTC are incredibly friendly, accommodating, and always approachable. I truly appreciate their dedication and care for the children. Thank you, Mindspace @ RTC, for your excellent service!

Thank you to Ethan and the MindSpace team for taking such great care of our child. It's amazing to see how much progress has been made, especially in the worksheets. A special thanks to Qiu Laoshi for her dedication in teaching Chinese. Our child has improved significantly in Chinese tingxie, and we are so grateful for all the hard work. We truly appreciate all the support from the team!
Great open house today. Lovely book reads + bouncy castle and face painting. My Champ thoroughly enjoyed. Thanks to Ms June and Mr Ethan and all the Mindspace staff for being so welcoming and helpful
